TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 280,000 to 287,000 head versus 257,000 week ago and 311,000 a year ago. Saturday's hog slaughter is guesstimated at about 40,000 to 55,000 head. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 121,000 to 126,000 head versus 128,000 week ago and 136,000 a year ago. Saturday's cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 19,000 to 35,000 head. Reuter
